edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui
Class CategoryTableModel

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui.CategoryTableModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.table.TableModel
public class CategoryTableModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.table.TableModel

The data model of the table that displays the tags matching the current query and selects which ones should be used for filtering.

Nested Class Summary
